Reviews.Content: the dvr is ok. the cameras are kinda crap. the colors dont match what they actually are. one of the cameras filled with water the first time it rained and broke. i was able to but better cameras to go with this dvr. it works

Reviews.Title: CURRIER LOK & SAFE
Reviews.Author: Ronald R Currier
Reviews.Content: Very easy install, and sharp pitcures I reccomed this product as it was very easy to mount the cameras, and easy to  set up the DVR.No problem with programing

Reviews.Title: Defender SN#301-8CH
Reviews.Author: Yvette Anderson
Reviews.Content: The system was easy enough to set up.  I am a bit disappointed in the clarity of the imaging at night.  Daytime is very clear but evening is very grainy.Having trouble setting up the remote viewing.  Went through all the steps and it cannot locate my router.  Sends me to another website and costs $30 for PCConfig - still cannot get the remote access up and running.

Reviews.Title: Defender SN301-8CH-002 8 Channel H.264 Smart DVR Security System is not that good product
Reviews.Author: Hamad
Reviews.Content: Defender SN301-8CH-002 8 Channel H.264 Smart DVR Security System is not that good product. I have used it for two months and it is not working very well  comparing to an old one purchased from other company two years ago which never had any problem with therefore I do not recommend to buy defender

Reviews.Title: Great price but had to port forward to use phone app
Reviews.Author: MustangWife
Reviews.Content: Sp the picture is awesome !! It was fairly easy to install !! We even used an extrenal screen so we could view it anytime !! The inly down fall was figuri out how to port forward ... Even after i learned that it took 3 days of trouble shooting to figure out that i needed to use the ip address for the dvr not the wireless router ... After that was all cleared up i can easily see everything from my phone... My ipad... Even another conputer ... Great price and great quility !! I will be buying more caneras soon !! It came with four and we can add up to 4 more !! :)

ProductInfo.Features:
H.264 video compression lets you record over a month of footage and save valuable hard drive space
Let the coaching iMenu teach you about the DVR's different settings and features
View video online with no service fees from any computer in the world
Compatible with BlackBerry, Windows Mobile, Symbian and iPhone Smart Phones.
